text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking fun with 3 ft @ 9s W swell and light 7 mph NW winds. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, with clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 7 ft @ 14s WNW with fresh 19 mph SSW winds, making it blown out and poor. Day after, 3 ft @ 11s W swell returns with 13 mph SE winds, offering some workable corners at spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay. Best: today.
